Articles.Content:
- KSP ADVENTURES -

if you wanna take a look.

Lauching Space stations, Satellites, Bases, Probes across planets

http://www.twitch.tv/averam

Status: OFFLINE

-- WARNING ! --

Running a heavy modded version of KSP v 0.17

Edited October 17, 2012 by tsunam1
nice im watching while i am \'working\' lol. Too bad i cant load up ksp on my work machine. what mods are you using? id comment on the stream but dont feel like making an account
kurtjmac is playing now at http://www.twitch.tv/kurtjmac
I was fascinated by your very circular orbit. And then I spotted Mechjeb =P

<b>

MODS:<br /><br /><a rel="nofollow" href="http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/showthread.php/12237-Silisko-Industries-Addon-Development-Thread-2?highlight=bace" target="_blank"> BACE Construction Co. / Protodobodyne</a><br /><a rel="nofollow" href="http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/showthread.php/9675-v0-16-Damned-Robotics-Version-1-2-1?highlight=bace" target="_blank">Damned Robotics</a><br /><a rel="nofollow" href="http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/showthread.php/10224-0-15-Parts-Dynasat-Satellites-and-Solar-Panels-new-parts!-%28rel-0-6%29-Jun-11?highlight=dynasat" target="_blank">Dynasat</a><br /><a rel="nofollow" href="http://www.kerbal.net/mod.php?id=10" target="_blank">Crewtank</a> <br /><a rel="nofollow" href="http://www.kerbal.net/mod.php?id=23" target="_blank">DEMV Rover</a> <br /><a rel="nofollow" href="http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/showthread.php/12329-0-17-Multiversal-Mechatronics-Fixed-Camera-1-2" target="_blank">Fixed Camera</a> <br /><a rel="nofollow" href="http://www.kerbal.net/mod.php?id=20" target="_blank">MechJeb - Autopilot</a><br /><a rel="nofollow" href="http://www.kerbal.net/mod.php?id=45" target="_blank">RemoTech</a><br /></b>

I've streamed before myself, and watched some other people stream, as well as rewatching some of my own videos... IMHO, unless your just doing crazy stuff and slamming builds together, KSP isn't much of a spectator sport. I learned the hard way no one wants to watch me try to match orbits with a capsule i'm trying to rescue in solar orbit for two hours (I'm anti-autopilots) Now I only stream when i'm screwing around and there are plenty of explosions to keep people entertained.

Rewatching my own stream later on makes me appreciate youtube and video editing. heh.
